newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Malaysia rubber market closed for holiday.
newsitem.headline: Malaysia rubber market closed for holiday.

text.p: The Malaysian rubber market is closed today for a Moslem religious holiday. The market reopens on May 9.
On Wednesday, Malaysian rubber prices fell further in late trading and closed lower after lack of consumer demand and weak overseas markets dampening sentiment.
At the close, May RSS Ones buyer fell four cents to 271.50 cents ($1.08) a tonne and May SMR 20 buyer was down 1.50 cents at 256 cents.
